title: [Compatible with both Windows and Mac] ORICO PFU3-2P Lightning Mac USB 3.0 2 Port PCI Express Host Controller Adapter Card for Mac 10.7 10.8 and 10.9 or Later and Windows 8 with Low - Profile PCI Slot Cover included
description: Smart InteractiveAchieved with FL1009 USB3.0 Host Controller Based on GoXtream xHCI Accelerator Engine from FrescoLogic,ORICO PFU3-2P USB3.0 PCI Express Host Controller Card add 2x Downstream USB3.0 Ports for your Desktop Computer via PCI Express Slot,Offer Transfer Rates Up To 5Gbps,10x Faster of USB2.0 and Backward Compatible with USB2.0,1.1 or 1.0.4PIN Molex Power Connector Power the Card via Power Supply of Computer and offer 5V 900mA Power for each Port.Integrated Filtering Unit with Solid State Capacitors allow a Reliable and Secure Connectivity.ORICO PFU3-2P Compatible with both Mac OS and Windows.With 2x Plug and Play High-Throughput USB3.0 Hosts,It will be a Key Solution Update your Mac or Windows Computer to USB3.0 and Transfer Your Files in a BreezeInstallation & Compatibility-Compatible with Mac OS X V10.8.x with Nature Driver,No Additional Driver and Application needed-Driver is needed for other Mac OS.Please Contact ORICO Customer Care Team for GenericUSBXHCI Open Source USB 3.0 xHC driver when mounting under Earlier or Later Mac OS-Compatible with Windows XP , 2003 , Vista , 2008 , 7 & Windows 8 32 or 64 Bit with WHQL Certified Driver-Both Standard & Low-Profile PCI Slot Cover included.Fit Any PCI Express x1 , x2 , x4 , x8 or x16 Slot,Can't Fit PCI Slot-A 15PIN SATA Power Connector in Available Hard Drive Bay and A 15PIN Male to 4PIN Female Cable (NOT Included in the Box) is Required for The Power Supply of This Item.Please ensure you do have the Cable and connect the Card to 15PIN SATA Power Connector in Hard Drive Bay with itWhat's in the Box1x ORICO PFU3-2P1x Driver CD1x Low-Profile PCI Slot Cover1x Mounting Screw1x User's Manual1x Warranty Card
